title: Vice President Biden to Travel to Gulf Coast Next Week | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
June 25, 2010

 



Vice President Biden to Travel to Gulf Coast Next Week




WASHINGTON, D.C.-Â  On Tuesday, June 29, Vice President Biden will travel to the Gulf Coast region to assess efforts to counter the BP oil spill. The Vice President will visit the National Incident Command Center in New Orleans, and will also visit the Florida panhandle. Additional details and media logistics will be released in the coming days.
